Checks if a certain packet's content matches a given filter (plain string or regex) or not.

Parameters:
packet Packet to analyze
plen packet length
Returns:
true if the content is matched, false elsewhere

int get_dlink_offset ( int  dlink_type  ) 

It gets the dlink offset at which IP/ARP header is found depending on dlink type.

Greetz to evilsocket's IPGrep for this algorithm.

Parameters:
dlink_type Data link type, depending on the kind of interface used (ethernet, PPP, PPPoE, token ring, SLIP...) and known through pcap_datalink
Returns:
Data link offset

This function prints info about TCP flags of a TCP packet.

Kept for back-compatibility.

Parameters:
